narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
This was a focused inspection limited to the "direct" 2.40 (b)(2) item included on the report for the March 29, 2016
inspection.  The female Shih Tzu x Poodle (#4771791D4A) had been examined by a veterinarian and a treatment
plan had been developed and followed.  
The inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
